channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-forbidden-func (0.0.2)
item.description: An extension for flake8 that forbids some functions in some modules.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: pep8-naming (0.13)
item.description: Check PEP-8 naming conventions, plugin for flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-secure-coding-standard (1.3)
item.description: Flake8 plugin adding some checks to make Python code adhere to more secure coding standard
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pep604 (1)
item.description: flake8 plugin to enforce use of `|` over `typing.Union`
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-new-union-types (0.4.1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to enforce the new Union and Optional annotation syntax defined in PEP 604
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-newspaper-style (0.3)
item.description: Check code for newspaper style
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-jungle (1.0.3)
item.description: Plugin to lint various issues in code.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-forbidden-func (0.0.1)
item.description: An extension for flake8 that forbids some functions in some modules.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-secure-coding-standard (1.2.2)
item.description: Flake8 plugin adding some checks to make Python code adhere to more secure coding standard
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-sarif (1.0.15)
item.description: SARIF Formatting Reporter plugin for Flake8

item.title: Updated: flake8-codes (0.2.2)
item.description: CLI tool to introspect flake8 plugins and their codes.

item.title: New: flake8-require-beartype (0.1.1)
item.description: flake8 plugin which checks for use of @beartype decorator.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-init-return (1)
item.description: flake8 plugin which makes sure that __init__ functions have a return type
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pyi (22.5.1)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 to enable linting .pyi files.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-comprehensions (3.10)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to help you write better list/set/dict comprehensions.

item.description: Flake8 plugin to enforce the new Union and Optional annotation syntax defined in PEP 604
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.description: Inject pyproject.toml support into flake8.

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (22.4.25)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)
